attributes.action: make it a criminal offence for any MP to lie on record.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose that a law be introduced making it a criminal offence, punishable by a minimum custodial sentance, for an MP to lie to parliament or to the press.  Imagine if we lived in a state where we knew our representives were honest with the public rather than the state we have today where the clear perception is that our represtatives willingly lie to us.
